metadata.name: CTRL_DAT_1
metadata.description:
*a mechanical flipdigits display, a pre-coded custom board, a black steel case; 20×20×7cm*

CTRL_DAT, a limited series of 5 *phygital* sculptures, is a study about time used as a base factor in the generative art field. In one year loops, every minute, the sculpture generates a new unrepeatable composition, covering a number of 525 600 in total (365d × 24h × 60m).

**Collector of the NFT will receive the physical sculpture with an instruction paper (printed and signed). Shipping not included.**

Read more about the creation process on [www.ksawerykomputery.pl](https://www.ksawerykomputery.pl/works/ctrl-dat)
